content: If you drive at an average speed of 65 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, how far will you travel?

If I drive at an average speed of 65 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, the distance I will travel can be calculated using the formula:

Distance = Speed × Time

Plugging in the values:

Distance = 65 mph × 4.5 hours = 292.5 miles

So, I will travel 292.5 miles.
